name: Momok
description:
A small version of omok (gomoku) with an elemental spirit theme and original pixel artwork.  This is a beta version without music, so feel free to pick your own soundtrack (we recommend Chiphop), and limited sound!

Two Game Modes:  

  • Single player against the AI
  • Llocal multiplayer against your friend!

Controls

Arrow keys - Movement/menu selection

X - performs an action (select menu option or place piece)

C - opens up a small help menu with some basic instructions.
